# Celestia-Node State API

### `GET`   `/balance`

Request
```
curl -X GET http://<ip>:26658/balance
```

Response
```
uceles999995000000000
```

### `POST`  `/balance/{address}`

Request
```
curl -X GET http://<ip>:26658/balance/celes1vuw7pdcyap2u62x6dyqjdzznlg25jll6jj76d0
```

Response
```go
uceles99999500000000
```

### `POST`  `/submit_tx/{tx}`

Request
```
curl -X POST http://<ip>:26658/submit_
```

Response
```
{"txhash":"E4B98AF73852A2FC99E1708C3C5B7CE93449A0E9381387D022FAE759F76E1F0D","codespace":"sdk","code":19,"logs":null}
```
